Abstract: The dataset represents the locations and attributes of Gas Stations in Washington, DC 2006

    <descript>
      <abstract>The dataset represents the locations and attributes of Gas Stations in Washington, DC 2006</abstract>
      <purpose>This data is used for the planning and management of Washington, D.C. by local government agencies.</purpose>
    </descript>
    <timeperd>
      <timeinfo>
        <sngdate>
          <caldate>05/01/06</caldate>

      </timeinfo>

    </status>

    <attracc>
      <attraccr>Validated by source and/or responsible agency.  Gas Stations geocoded to the DC Master Address Repository which places most addresses in the visual center of planimetric building polygons.</attraccr>

        <srccontr>location and attribution</srccontr>
      </srcinfo>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the CD obtained from Washington, DC 2005

Staff digitized gas station locations by examining data from the DC Energy Office, the underground storage tanks layer, basic business license data from DCRA, and Dun and Bradstreet business data.   Then staff geocoded the list to the MAR and hand placed the remaining points using the 2003 orthophoto and 2005 satellite imagery.  Possible gas stations were compared with 2005 satellite imagery to determine if the gas station still existed.  </procdesc>
        <procdate>2006</procdate>
        <proccont>

            <cntvoice/>

            <cntemail>dcgis@dc.gov</cntemail>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>

        <srcused>E:\DCGISDATA_FINAL\Miscellaneous\GasStationPt</srcused>
        <procdate/>

    </lineage>
